displayName.english: It's Just A Color... Out Of Space
displayName.german: Das Ist Nur Eine Farbe... Aus Dem All
displayName.french: C’est une couleur… Tombée du ciel.
displayName.italian: Era soltanto un colore... venuto dallo spazio

displayName.schinese: 这只是种颜色……来自太空
displayName.tchinese: 這只是種顏色…來自太空

displayName.english: Damn Right, It's Prepper Than Yours
displayName.french: Les arbres ont disparu, mais ça sent l’hydrogène sulfuré

displayName.schinese: 没错，我的准备比你更充分
displayName.tchinese: 沒錯，我的準備比你更充分
displayName.japanese: お前のより断然、準備ができてる
displayName.brazilian: Pois é, o meu é melhor que o seu

displayName.english: My Workstation Brings All the Preppers To The Yard

displayName.tchinese: 我的營地吸引了所有生存者

displayName.english: That Is Not Dead Which Can Eternal Lie
